text: "Island in the Sun" is a 2001 song by American rock band Weezer and is the second single from their third studio album Weezer (Green Album). It went to number 17 in France, number 30 in Scotland, number 31 in the United Kingdom, number 47 in New Zealand and number 78 in Australia. ==Track listings== An erroneous short mix of "Always" ended up on the singles, and the correct mix (2:48) was released as an MP3 on the band's website. == References == Category:2001 songs Category:Weezer songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Power pop songs
title: Island in the Sun (Weezer song)
